name: Can It Fly
description:
One day someone said in response to someone else, "I'll do it when pigs fly".

Hearing this gave an idea to a pig who set out on a mission to fly through the sky.

Launch various characters to see how far they can go and fly through the sky!

Q: Can a pig fly?

A: Yes.

FEATURES:

-Collect over 50 unique voxel characters

-Launch characters and bounce them off of vehicles in this endless flyer

-Simple, fun, gameplay

-Free to play

Now available on Google Play!
